definition: Jezebel, wife of Ahab and mother of Ahaziah, major character in 1 Kings 16:31, 19:1, 21 and 2 Kings 9, killed by Jehu 耶戶|耶户[Ye1 hu4]
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

sentences.english: However, the queen of the land, Jezebel, was greatly enraged.
sentences.chinese: 可是，该地的王后耶洗别非常恼怒。

sentences.english: Queen Jezebel meets a prophesied horrible death.
sentences.chinese: 耶洗别王后照先知所预言的惨死。

definition: Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Absalom, third son of David, king of Israel (Old Testament)
Jehu (842-815 BC), Israelite king, prominent character in 2 Kings 9:10
Hezekiah or Ezekias (740-687 BC), twelfth king of Judah (Judaism)
variant of 撒旦[Sa1 dan4], Satan or Shaitan
